memberdef.name: mccc_coefs_cab
memberdef.initializer: ( \ nb * qa*qa * qb*qb * clogab / ( 4 * CONST_PI * CONST_E0*CONST_E0 ) )

memberdef.name: mccc_coefs_Q
memberdef.initializer: ( \ -mccc_coefs_cab(qa, qb, nb, clogab) * mu0 / ( ma * mb * vb*vb ) )

memberdef.name: mccc_coefs_dQ
memberdef.initializer: ( \ -mccc_coefs_cab(qa, qb, nb, clogab) * dmu0 / ( ma * mb * vb*vb*vb ) )

briefdescription.para: Evaluate derivative of non-relativistic drag coefficient [m/s^2].

memberdef.name: mccc_coefs_F
memberdef.initializer: ( \ -( 1/mb + 1/ma ) * mccc_coefs_cab(qa, qb, nb, clogab) * mu0 \ / ( ma * vb*vb ) )

memberdef.name: mccc_coefs_Dpara
memberdef.initializer: ( \ ( va > 0 ) ? \ mccc_coefs_cab(qa, qb, nb, clogab) * mu0 / ( 2 * ma*ma * va ) : \ mccc_coefs_cab(qa, qb, nb, clogab) * 4 \ / ( 6 * CONST_SQRTPI * ma*ma * vb ) )

memberdef.name: mccc_coefs_dDpara
memberdef.initializer: ( \ mccc_coefs_cab(qa, qb, nb, clogab) * ( dmu0/vb - mu0/va ) \ / ( 2 * ma*ma * va ) )

briefdescription.para: Evaluate derivative of non-relativistic parallel diffusion coefficient [m/s^2].

memberdef.name: mccc_coefs_Dperp
memberdef.initializer: ( \ ( va > 0 ) ? \ mccc_coefs_cab(qa, qb, nb, clogab) * mu1 / ( 2 * ma*ma * va ) : \ mccc_coefs_cab(qa, qb, nb, clogab) * 4 \ / ( 6 * CONST_SQRTPI * ma*ma * vb ) )

memberdef.argsstring: (real *clogab, real ma, real qa, real va, int nspec, const real *mb, const real *qb, const real *nb, const real *Tb)
memberdef.name: mccc_coefs_clog

detaileddescription.para: Coulomb logarithm is evaluated separately with respect to each plasma species. It is calculated as a logarithm of the ratio of maximum and minimum impact parameters. Maximum impact parameter is the Debye length and minimum impact parameter is either classical particle radius or inverse of De Broglie wavelength.

parameterdescription.para: array where evaluated values for Coulomb logarithm are stored.

briefdescription.para: Evaluate special functions needed by collision coefficients.

detaileddescription.para: This function either evaluates the special functions directly or interpolates them from look-up table which should be initialized with mccc_init() before calling this function.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to array where values are stored

briefdescription.para: Routines to evaluate coefficients needed to evaluate collisions.
